QuestData.Title: Dark Grimoire: The Second Ingredient
QuestData.Description:
With the blasting powder acquired, you now must find a suitable detonator. A note attached to the entry in the cookbook hints to where one might be found:
"Reminder: Order more high-voltage detonators. The last shipment was lost off of the Shadowmoon coast near the demon-inhabited cliffs. Maybe we should send a diving team to salvage."
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the clue from Megacharge's Cookbook to find the high voltage detonator.

Objectives.Objective: Follow the clue to find the detonator
